select_locations: select * from locations order by name asc
select_time: select estimated_time from times where timestamp = (select max(timestamp) from times where location_id =
select_time_count: select count(*) from times where location_id =
select_lowest_time: select min(estimated_time) from times where location_id =
select_highest_time: select max(estimated_time) from times where location_id =
select_location_info: select id, name from locations where phone =
insert_reject: insert into reports (timestamp, original_time, location_id) values (?, ?, ?)
insert_accept: insert into reports (timestamp, original_time, parsed_time, location_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?)
insert_time: insert into times (timestamp, estimated_time, location_id) values (?, ?, ?)
